home.complianceDesc: "BIS hallmarking and GST compliance require manual tracking, taking 10+ hours per month away from the actual business."
home.creditDesc: "Traditional banks can take 15-30 days for credit decisions and often charge 18-24% interest rates, if they approve at all."

features.problemHeading: Traditional banking wasn't built for jewellers.
features.problemDesc: Long settlement cycles, volatile cash flow, complex reconciliation, and a lack of affordable, collateral-aware credit hold your business back.
features.howItWorksDesc: We provide the four core pillars of financial infrastructure needed to run and scale a modern jewellery business.
features.bankingRailsDesc: Providing CASA accounts via partner banks, UPI and virtual accounts, and working towards instant settlements with zero MDR on UPI.
features.creditSolutionsDesc: Facilitating inventory-backed financing and working capital loans with AI-powered credit assessment and co-lending with partner banks & NBFCs.
features.complianceAutomationDesc: Automate GST filing tracking, BIS hallmarking compliance, and generate automated, audit-ready reports.
features.businessDashboardDesc: Get real-time cash flow insights, monitor transactions, track credit utilization, and view key financial analytics.
features.benefit2: Zero setup fees during the pilot period
features.benefit4: Priority support from the founding team
features.benefit5: Exclusive pricing for the first year post-launch
features.faq1A: GEMBank is a fintech platform designed for the jewellery industry. We partner with banks and financial institutions to provide tailored banking infrastructure, credit solutions, and compliance automation tools.
features.faq2A: Absolutely. Security is our top priority. We partner with RBI-regulated financial institutions to handle all funds. Your data is protected with bank-grade, end-to-end encryption.
features.faq3Q: Do you hold physical gold or inventory?
features.faq3A: No, GEMBank is a financial technology platform. We do not take custody of physical assets. We provide the digital tools to help you manage, finance, and get value from your inventory through our network of partners.
features.faq4Q: How will the Credit Marketplace work?
features.faq4A: Our goal is to create a marketplace where you can submit a financing request and our network of verified lenders (Banks & NBFCs) can make competitive offers. This aims to give you better terms and faster decisions, with minimal paperwork.
features.faq5Q: What are the requirements to join the pilot?
features.faq5A: Businesses need to be registered entities in the jewellery trade (e.g., retailer, wholesaler, manufacturer) with a valid business license and bank account. We have a simple digital application process to get you started.

chatbot.title: GEMini Assistant
chatbot.systemInstruction: You are GEMini, a friendly and proactive AI assistant for GEMBank, a fintech platform for jewelers in India. Your personality is helpful, knowledgeable, and slightly enthusiastic. Your goal is to answer questions and guide users to relevant actions on the website. Be conversational. When a user asks about topics like joining the pilot program, getting credit, applying, or expressing interest, you should become very proactive. Strongly recommend they visit the 'Pilot Program' page to apply. Crucially, you must mention that the 'Pilot Program' page has a special AI assistant that can help them fill out the application form (the Letter of Intent or LOI) just by chatting. Frame this as a cool, easy way to apply. For all other questions, guide them to the most relevant pages on the site (e.g., 'How it Works', 'Contact', 'Blog').
